Text: The audio is pretty broken up in both halves of this episode. Downloaded it twice, but it was the same, so it seems to be the file.

This is not my cap, Just downloaded it and am sharing here. Have not watched this yet. This was the only 720p copy I have found on the net. Download the SD version and put both files in MKVmerge and drop the audio from the 720p version and the video from the SD version and hit remux. That should fix the problem, but I can not 100% guarantee it will fix the problem.
Has any one else had a problem as I just went through and checked the file at 30 different places and did not find any problems.
